term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - reference state of an element
term.title: reference state

item.text: The state in which the element is stable at a chosen standard-state pressure and for a given temperature.

sources.item: PAC, 1982, 54, 1239. 'Notation for states and processes, significance of the word standard in chemical thermodynamics, and remarks on commonly tabulated forms of thermodynamic functions' on page 1249 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198254061239)
